text: nagara athi wima ha deshapalanaya nagarika wima gana adhyayanayak keri athayi ma hithanne naha

jangama durakathana awama gasthuwa thawaduratath pahala damimata shri lanka widuli sandesha niyamana komishan sabhawa thiranaya kara atha.ee sandaha durakathana samagam wetha awasara labadi thibena bawath labana juli masaye sita nawa kramaya kriyathmaka kerena bawath shri lanka widuli sandesha niyamana komshan sabhawe adhyaksha janaral anusha palpita mahatha pawasayi.jangama durakathana sandaha widuli sandesha niyamana komishan sabhawa wisin danata niyama kara thibena miniththuwak sandaha wu rupiyal 2.00 awama gasthuwa nawa kramaya yatathe rupiyal 1.50 k wana bawada ee mahatha sandahan karayi.paribhogikayanta sahana salasima sandaha ayawaya lekhanaya mangin rajaya janathawata labadun poronduwak me mangin ituwana bawada hethema kiya siti.shri lankawe sthawara durakathanawalata sapekshawa jangama durakathana sabandathawe wishala wardhanayak pennum karana bawada anusha palpita mahatha penwa deyi.merata bhawitha karana durakathana pramanaya miliyana 20 kata aasanna wana bawath in miliyana 17 kata aasanna sankhyawak jangama durakathana bawa da widuli sandesha niyamana komishan sabhawe adhyaksha janaralwaraya sandahan karayi..

habayi kelloth ahu wechcha welawe apita denawa bastiya,bari welawath ape sereppuwak ehema issarahata giyoth payin gahala yawanawa issarahatama,ithin yamallako issarahatama maha mudali wage sereppuwa araganna.
eya 2005 mayi 08 wanida ‘lakbima’ irida sangrahaye pala wuye meseya.

swadeshika aprikanuwan pahathkota salakima yuropa palanaya yatathe dakunu aprikawe podu sadhakayak wiya. 1948 jathika pakshaye jayagrahanaya samanga eya deguna theguna wuye warnabhedawadaya karaliyata paminimath samangaya.
eekath methana pala kalata waradak na kiyala hithuna.
